review: Amazon - if you are listening - would appreciate a response to this.  The objective behind my purchasing this was to be able to use it when I travel (which I do often).  However, I can't connect to hotel WiFi because there is no way to get past the login screens.  So tell me - how is this product useful for this specific use case?  In addition, games and movies that I purchased - why do I have to connect to the internet before consuming them, even if they are downloaded?  Why do I have to prove everytime that I have purchased these?Appreciate your attention,Shobs
